counterlist.query: select CurrentRequests, PingCommandsPending, SyncCommandsPending, RequestsPerSec from Win32_PerfFormattedData_MSExchangeActiveSync_MSExchangeActiveSync
select ActiveConnectionCount, ClientRPCsFailedServerTooBusy, RPCRequests, RPCAveragedLatency, UserCount from Win32_PerfFormattedData_MSExchangeIS_MSExchangeIS

select ActiveClientLogons, MessagesQueuedForSubmission, MessagesSentPersec, MessagesDeliveredPersec, MessagesSubmittedPersec, RPCAverageLatency from Win32_PerfFormattedData_MSExchangeIS_MSExchangeISMailbox

select ActiveMailboxDeliveryQueueLength, ActiveNonSmtpDeliveryQueueLength, ActiveRemoteDeliveryQueueLength, AggregateDeliveryQueueLengthAllQueues, ItemsQueuedforDeliveryPerSecond, LargestDeliveryQueueLength, MessagesQueuedForDelivery, RetryMailboxDeliveryQueueLength, RetryNonSmtpDeliveryQueueLength, RetryRemoteDeliveryQueueLength, SubmissionQueueLength, UnreachableQueueLength from Win32_PerfFormattedData_MSExchangeTransportQueues_MSExchangeTransportQueues
